<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/chat-gateway/v1/channels/{channelId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes ChatAPI channel by the provided Id.

<Heading
  id={"request"}

  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>
